verses.verse: Now when these <S%H428>things<s%> were <S%H3615>done,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> separated <S%H914>themselves<s%> from the <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> doing according to their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> even of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabites,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

And when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> I <S%H7167>rent<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>mantle,<s%> and plucked <S%H4803>off<s%> the <S%H4480>hair<s%> <S%H8181><s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> and of my <S%H2206>beard,<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H8074>astonished.<s%>

Then were <S%H622>assembled<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H2730>trembled<s%> at the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H4604>transgression<s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away;<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice.<s%>

And at the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice<s%> I arose <S%H6965>up<s%> from my <S%H4480>heaviness;<s%> <S%H8589><s%> and having <S%H7167>rent<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>mantle,<s%> I <S%H3766>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> I am <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>blush<s%> to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee, my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> our <S%H7218>head,<s%> and our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is grown <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

Since the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H587>we<s%> been in a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>trespass<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H587>we,<s%> our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> been <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and to a <S%H961>spoil,<s%> and to <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>space<s%> <S%H8467>grace<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> showed <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H7604>leave<s%> us a remnant to <S%H6413>escape,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> that our <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H215>lighten<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4241>reviving<s%> in our <S%H5659>bondage.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H587>we<s%> were <S%H5650>bondmen;<s%> yet our <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> us in our <S%H5659>bondage,<s%> but hath <S%H5186>extended<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> us in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4241>reviving,<s%> to set <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H5975>repair<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> thereof, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H1447>wall<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H776>land,<s%> unto <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is an <S%H5079>unclean<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H5079>filthiness<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> with their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H4390>filled<s%> it from one <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6310>another<s%> with their <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> or their <S%H2896>wealth<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and leave it for an <S%H3423>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us for our <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>deeds,<s%> and for our <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>trespass,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> that <S%H859>thou<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> hast <S%H2820>punished<s%> us <S%H4295>less<s%> than our <S%H4480>iniquities<s%> <S%H5771><s%> deserve, and hast <S%H5414>given<s%> us such <S%H6413>deliverance<s%> as <S%H2063>this;<s%>

Should we <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and join in <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations?<s%> wouldest <S%H3808>not<s%> thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us <S%H5704>till<s%> thou hadst <S%H3615>consumed<s%> us, so that there should be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> nor <S%H6413>escaping?<s%>
